Court Info: COURT OF DISTRICT JUDGE-II-CUM-MOTOR VEHICLE ACCIDENT CLAIM TRIBUNAL, JAMSHEDPUR
Applicant Address: village Kashidih, P.S. Potka, District Singhbhum East, State Jharkhand
The Petition in short, is as under: The case of the applicants is that on 27.02.2020 at about 6 p.m. Dr. Mrinmay Bhakat (Since deceased) was going to his clinic in Kasidih, Sakchi, when on reaching near Sunsunia gate a trailer bearing registration no. JH-05CA-3265, being driven by its driver in high speed got uncontrolled and dashed him from behind, causing his death on the spot. It is alleged that the deceased was a dentist by profession and was earning Rs. 60,000/- per month at the time of his death and had a bright future ahead.
Opponent 2: The New India Assurance Company Limited

Applicant Address: Babudih, Pata, P.O- Chainpur, P.S. Chandil, District Seraikela- Kharsawan and presently resided at Mango, P.S Mango, Jamshedpur, Distt. East Singhbhum
The Petition in short, is as under: The case of applicant as made out from typed claim petition is that on 03-11-2018 at or about 11.00 p.m the driver of offending truck bearing registration no. JH06-G-3480, driving the vehicle rashly and negligently, crashed into his house, causing damage to his entire house and house hold articles i.e one colour TV, three ceiling fan, two table fan, one refrigerator, two beds, Kitchen Articles and thereby caused a loss to the tune of Rs.3,50,000/- to him. It is further the case of applicant that pertaining to the aforesaid accident Chandil P.S case no. 193 of 2018 dated 04-11-2018 has been registered for the offence punishable u/s 279, 337, 338,427 of IPC on the basis of written report of the applicant.

Court Info: COURT OF DISTRICT JUDGE-II-CUM-MOTOR VEHICLE ACCIDENT CLAIM TRIBUNAL JAMSHEDPUR
Applicant Name: Menjari Munduiya, Renga Munduiya, Jonga Munduiya, Manju Munduiya, Raymuni Munduiya, Balema Munduiya, Randay Munduiya
Applicant Age: 42 years, 05 years, 08 years, 12 years, 13 years, 15 years, 17 years
Applicant Address: village Chedeyapahari , Asura, PO Asura, Jhinkpani, Dist. West Singhbhum, Jharkhand
The Petition in short, is as under: The case of the applicants is that on 24.12.2019 Janum Singh Munduiya (since deceased) and his friend Hira Lohar were proceeding towards Kuldiha market by motorcycle no. JH-06B-8300 in moderate speed on left side of the road and when they had reached near Kuldiha more, the driver of tanker No. WB-61-8560, driving the vehicle in very rash and negligent manner dashed the motorcycle very violently as a result of which the deceased and the pillion rider received serious multiple injuries and their motorcycle was also damaged badly. It is the case of the applicants that both of them were taken to Sadar Hospital, Chaibasa and then to MGM Hospital, Jamshedpur for treatment, where the deceased Janum Singh Mundiya could not survive and died on 28.12.2019. It is pleaded that the deceased was aged about 57 years and used to work as a mason earning Rs. 500/- per day and as such Rs. 13,000/- per month.
Hospital Names: Sadar Hospital, Chaibasa, MGM Hospital, Jamshedpur

Court Info: COURT OF DISTRICT JUDGE-II-CUM-MOTOR VEHICLE ACCIDENT CLAIM TRIBUNAL, JAMSHEDPUR
Applicant Name: Nirmal Ray, Neha Roy, Taniya Roy
Applicant Address: 253 Shakti Nagar Bara Gamhariya, P.O. Bara Gamhariya, Dist. Seraikela-Kharswan. 832108.
The Petition in short, is as under: The case of the applicants is that on 21.03.2020 Sapna Ray (Since deceased) was waiting for an auto-rickshaw near Utkal Automobile, Adityapur, when a truck bearing registration no. BR-01GH-3845, coming from Gamharia side, being driven by its driver in very rash and negligent manner and in very high speed, dashed her causing grievous injuries to her and with the help of local police and police she was taken to MGM Hospital, Jamshedpur for treatment, but was declared brought dead by the doctor. It is case of the applicants that the deceased, aged about 44 years at the time of the accident, was a private tutor and used to give tuition to matriculation students, from which she used to earn a sum of Rs. 15,000/- per month. It is also case of the applicants that they were fully dependent on earning of the deceased.

Court Info: COURT OF DISTRICT JUDGE-II-CUM-MOTOR VEHICLE ACCIDENT CLAIM TRIBUNAL JAMSHEDPUR
Applicant Name: Subhra Shit, Minor Ishika Prajapati, Tara Devi
Applicant Address: village 89 UJ, Village Ittabhatta, Jadugora, Dist East Singhbhum, Jharkhand-832102.
The Petition in short, is as under: The case of the applicant is that Dhananjay Prajapati (Since deceased), husband of the applicant no.1 Subhra Shit, was a Supervisor in UCIL Dam Construction Site and on 17.07.2020, while he was engaged in night duty, watching for soil erosion and loading-unloading at construction site, the driver of Hyva vehicle, having registration no. JH-05CF-8156, driving the vehicle in rash and negligent manner dashed him, as a result of which he sustained serious multiple injuries and though with the help of the other labours he was taken to TMH, Jamshedpur for treatment but was declared brought dead. It is also case of the applicants that the deceased was aged about 29 years and was hale and hearty prior to the accident and was employed under M/S Radhey Shyam Agrawal (A-Class Government Civil Contractor) as Supervisor, earning Rs. 15,000/- per month.

Applicant Address: Village Angarishol, Chandrapur, P.S. Barsole District â€“ East Singhbhum, Jharkhand
The Petition in short, is as under: The case of the applicants, as per the claim petition, is that on 30.12.2019 at about 8.00 A.M, the deceased met with a motor vehicular accident on N.H. 33 near Village Barabanki while returning from Angarishol to Kadma travelling in Ford Eco Sport vehicle no. JH 05BV-2541 owned by O.P. No.2. It is case of the applicants that the vehicle was being driven by O.P. No.2 in moderate speed, during which a vehicle came in front of it and he was unable to control the car which skidded and rolled over causing injuries to all the occupants, in the course of which the deceased died while undergoing treatment in T.M.H. It is also claimed that a UD Case bearing no. 20/2019 was registered by the M.G.M (Mango) police station. It is further claimed that the deceased was a very active housewife and was also associated with various social reformatory works and on account of her death the applicants have been permanently deprived of their mother.

Applicant Address: Kaiser Bangalow, Hulang Road P.O. & P.S. Kadma, Town - Jamshedpur District - East Singhbhum, Road No. 4-C, Kusum Vihar, Morabadi District - Ranchi, Pin - 834004
The Petition in short, is as under: The case of the applicants, as per the claim petition, is that on 10.11.2017 at half past eleven in the night the applicant no.1, her husband Pranay Sinha and the deceased were going to Kadma residence of the applicant no.1 riding Tata Manza Car No. JH05AS-5152 and when reached near Airport Gate, Dindli Enclave, the driver of Jaguar Car No. JH05VX-0096 driving it in rash and negligent manner dashed their car which the deceased had boarded, on account of which she sustained grievous injury and had to be taken to Tata Main Hospital, Bistupur, where she died.
Opponent 2: Bharti AXA General Insurance Co. Ltd.
